modName: Sexy Adventurer's Outfit with butt bounce UNPK
descriptionHtml:
As required by Nexus rules, I've made a skimpy/nude version of the Adventurer's Outfit, with butt bounce! (no breast bounce) The body model I've used here is the UNPK body, although the textures in this mod will work with any UNP family body model-

(http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32540/?)

This mod has a version with just the shirt and bare legs, which you can use with any other boots, and another version of the shirt meant to go with the tall boots. In order to get any butt bounce you need a tbbp compatible skeleton and all that stuff.

This mod contains a panties and no panties version of the Adventurer's Outfit with the leather pants removed. Both files also contain the regular Adventurer's Outfit getup, so if you'd like to have the option of crafting skimpy and regular outfits, you can do that here. If you download either of these files, you don't have to download the regular Adventurer's Outfit mod. Everything is craftable at a smith.

INSTALLATION- just drag and drop to your Skyrim Data folder.

CREDITS-
Hentai for the mesh/textures of the tall boots.
author: gooboo
